before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fv3v5","text":"Wipe bench surfaces with RNAse Away and keep working environment clean. Maintain the RNA samples on ice, and prepare the RT-PCR mixture on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7tlrh","text":"This protocol describes the procedure of RT-PCR for the allelic discrimination between wild type and mutation alleles in specific positions of the SARS-CoV-2 genome. Starting with isolated RNA from SARS-CoV-2 positive wastewater samples, this workflow combines Applied Biosystems TaqMan SNP Genotyping Assays with a one-step RT-PCR reaction to detect whether there are known SARS-CoV-2 mutations present in the wastewater samples.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c4v1","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21om4","text":"Sequence-specific forward and reverse primers amplify the target sequence region in each mutation assay. The reverse primer also primes reverse transcription of the SARS-CoV-2 genomic RNA sequences. Each mutation assay includes two TaqMan minor groove binder probes with nonfluorescent quenchers: one VIC dye labelled probe to detect the reference sequence and one FAM dye labelled probe to detect the mutation sequence.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: “Systematic Surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 and its variants in wastewaters, Portugal (Ref. 060701/2021/864489/SUB/ENV.C2)”, financed by The European Commission through the Emergency Support Instrument

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0j2q","text":"TaqPath 1-Step RT-qPCR Master Mix CG, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog A15299","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf38m","text":"AcroMterix SARS-CoV-2 Control, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog 954519","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ddgr","text":"Mutation Assay: S.G339D.GGT.GAT, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog CV47VRX","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an82m","text":"Mutation Assay: S.Q493R.CAA.CGA, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog CVH49P2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nfup","text":"Mutation Assay: S.L452R.CTG.CGG, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog CVAAAAD","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48fh8","text":"Mutation Assay: S.T547K.ACA.AAA, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog CVYMJGA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abce7","text":"Mutation Assay: M.D3N.GAT.AAT, ThermoFisher Scientific, Catalog CVAAAAK","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3203","text":"Mutation Assay: ORF7b.L11F.TTG.TTT, ThermoFisher Scientifc, Catalog CVCE3VH","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6qvg5","text":"Prepare the amplification mixture as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vsqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l9aa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"228n2","text":"To the 15 μl of reaction mix, add 5 μl of wastewater RNA sample, or no-template control (DNAse/RNAse free water), or a wild-type AcroMetrix Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) RNA control, to complete 20 μl of reaction volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Reagent","Concentration in the reaction"],"colWidths":["311.98370361328125","199.00271606445312"],"data":[["TaqPath 1-Step RT-qPCR Master Mix CG (4X)","1X"],["Mutation assay (40X)","2X"],["DNAse/RNAse free water ","up to 15 µL"]],"guid":"CF9059801F0711EEBC25B7B1E0B98821","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["TaqPath 1-Step RT-qPCR Master Mix CG (4X)","1X"],["Mutation assay (40X)","2X"],["DNAse/RNAse free water ","up to 15 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5necp","text":"Thermocycling conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jv4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amaml","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8taqq","text":"Set the detection module for FAM and VIC labelled probes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"D_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"D_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"D_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"D_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Step","Temperature (ºC)","Time","No. Cycles"],"colWidths":["192","122","50","88"],"data":[["Reverse transcription","45","15'",""],["Taq polymerase activation ","95","2'",""],["Denaturation","95","15''","45"],["Annealing","58","45''",""],["Post-read","60","30'",""]],"guid":"6C106FC01F0811EEBC25B7B1E0B98821","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"D_3":[1,2]},"printData":[["Reverse transcription","45","15'",""],["Taq polymerase activation ","95","2'",""],["Denaturation","95","15''","45"],["Annealing","58","45''",""],["Post-read","60","30'",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6l1ku","text":"The allelic discrimination results can be graphed on a scatter plot contrasting reporter dye florescence (i.e., allele X versus allele Y), and analyzed with the QuantStudio Design and Analysis Software, using the genotyping analysis module with real-time data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":106,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
